name: sulkily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is sulky (= refusing to smile or be pleasant to people, usually because you are angry about something): He replied sulkily that she had no interest at all in going with them. "I don't like her," said Clare sulkily. See
sulky
More examplesFewer examplesShe sighed, and sulkily began to put on her clothes. "I don't think you want me to get a girlfriend," Stuart sulkily concluded.He turned his back on the crowd, and stared sulkily across the street.
